#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define inf 200000000000
long long int arr[20000];
using namespace std;

void power()
{
    int i;
    arr[0]=1;
    for(i=1;i<2000;i++)
    {
        arr[i]=arr[i-1]*2;
    }
}
int main()
{
  long long   int n,j,index;
    cin>>n;
    long long int i,a[n],b[n];
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
{
    b[i]=0;
}

    power();
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        cin>>a[i];
    }



    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        for(j=0;j<=2000;j++)
        {
            if(i+arr[j]<=n)
            {
             //  cout<<j<<endl;
              index = i + arr[j];
                if(b[index]!=0)
                {
               long long     int x = b[index];

                    b[index] = min (x,(b[i] + (abs(a[i] - a[index]))));
                }
                else
                    b[index] = b[i] + abs(a[i] - a[index]);
            }
         else
            {
                break;
            }
        }

    }
   cout<<b[n-1]<<endl;

    return 0;

}
